description: Detects changes to RDP terminal service sensitive settings Author: Samir Bousseaden, David ANDRE. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: RDP Sensitive Settings Changed
query: winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\services\\TermService\\Parameters\\ServiceDll* OR *\\Control\\Terminal\ Server\\fSingleSessionPerUser* OR *\\Control\\Terminal\ Server\\fDenyTSConnections* OR *\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\Terminal\ Services\\Shadow* OR *\\Control\\Terminal\ Server\\WinStations\\RDP\-Tcp\\InitialProgram*)
